channel.title: Posts on Damiansblog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Damiansblog

item.title: Fooled by Randomness - Book Notes & Summary - 9 / 10
item.description: My notes on the book ‘Fooled by Randomness’ by Nassim Taleb. A great book to learn more about our flawed thinking and our biases.

item.title: Oversimplification
item.description: Human beings have a natural desire for simplicity and understanding. The danger lies in our tendency to oversimplify complex matters and our inability to acknowledge that we don’t know something.

item.title: Literature: Classical vs Modern
item.description: An essay dealing with the question whether classical literature is inherently better than modern literature. I take the position that it is not, but we should still read more classical works than modern ones, mostly because time filters out low-quality works.

item.title: Guideline for life - Embrace struggle over comfort
item.description: An essay about why stressors make us stronger and why struggle over comfort could lead to a happier life.

item.title: 3 Kinds of Knowledge
item.description: My take on 3 different kinds of knowledge. Pure facts - Applied Knowledge - Conceptual Knowledge.

item.title: On Writing: Why you should write
item.description: An essay on the art of writing and its potential benefits for your personal and professional life
